name: Tic Tac Toe - Construct 3 Template | No coding required
name_original: Tic Tac Toe - Construct 3 Template | No coding required
description:
Download Tic Tac Toe game template for Construct 3. Contains admob integration, you will just need to update the global variables.

You can use this as a separate or part of a project.

No coding knowledge required.

Easy to use.

Export to Android, iOS, Web and desktop platforms with just one click.

Three game modes

1. Easy mode with AI

2. Hard mode with AI

3. Local multiplayer

Construct 3 r209 subscription is required

Simply replace the global variables with the required ad units and add your ad ID to the advert plugin to make it work.
